document.full_text: general electric co  chief executive jeffrey immelt defended the nuclear industry's safety record on monday during a trip to tokyo to show support to the operator of a stricken nuclear plant using reactors designed by the u.s. conglomerate.
document.title: ge's immelt defends nuclear industry safety record
lines_and_colors: general electric co  chief executive jeffrey immelt defended the nuclear industry's safety record on monday during a trip to tokyo to show support to the operator of a stricken nuclear plant using reactors designed by the u.s. conglomerate.
